column5: With higher then normal water conditions in the rainy lake/rainy river, we got hammered with downpours and now the water continues to rise. Fort frances, international falls and rainy river have began sandbagging. FN's northwest bay and stanji are also currently in trouble. The township of rainy river looks to be in much danger, the river is feet from the township. More rain forecasted as well. Geez. We are pretty safe/elevated here but i think will go help our friends sandbag in rainy river. Crazy
Good luck - hopefully the rains give you a break!
Just down from our shacks 2 days ago. The water has risen about 4ft since:(barwick lighthouse and boat launch yesterday. Water is still rising
It's been bad for alot of folks this spring, sure hope your friends all get through it OK
Thanks spincast and lew:) yeah it just seems like that crazy winter weather has just carried over. We got gnarly rain forecasted again later this week, let's hope that changes
The kids are coming with us to help too. Hope it'll show them some lessons 1) helping your friends and neighbours is apart of being human 2) how destructive water/nature can be
get going and stop reading the election thread.LOL  BEST OF LUCK TO ALL.  Hope all stay safe.
Good luck and be safe.Never been in a flood myself,but I sure feel for the peolple that have.Let's hope the rain changes course.
Nice of you to help out your neighbours, i wish you all the best of luck.
